sentences.sContent: He said he liked the tea set.
You will love the following tea set called “Tea-time”.
sentences.sCn: 你会爱上这款名为“叹茶一刻”的茶具！

sentences.sContent: Someone had given him a little "tea set" as a get-well gift and it was one of his favorite toys.
sentences.sCn: 有人送给他一套茶具，作为祝他早日康复的礼物，这成了他最喜欢的玩具。

trans.tranOther: a matching set with a teapot, cups, and plates, which you use for serving tea
